channel.title: Munki-Enroll on Cody Eding
channel.description: Recent content in Munki-Enroll on Cody Eding

item.title: Setup secure Munki repository and munki-enroll on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS
item.description: I managed several thousand Macintosh desktops in a previous job with the help of Munki, an awesome open-source tool written by Greg Neagle. Alongside Munki, I created munki-enroll, which is now a popular way to manage the automated creation of computer-specific Munki manifests. I recently worked on a GitHub bug report that was actually not a bug in the munki-enroll code, but instead a problem stemming from a lack of documentation regarding the server-side requirements of munki-enroll.
